channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7936] Support for handling Thrift Union types
item.description: Currently hive does not support thrift unions through ThriftDeserializer. Need to add support for the same
item.summary: Support for handling Thrift Union types

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: Support Thrift union type as hive union type
